mapper.insert: INSERT INTO School (id, studentCode, name, primarySchool, juniorHigh, seniorHigh, undergraduate, graduate, doctorate) VALUES (#{id}, #{studentCode}, #{name}, #{primarySchool}, #{juniorHigh}, #{seniorHigh}, #{undergraduate}, #{graduate}, #{doctorate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM School WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY id LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE School SET name = #{name}, studentCode = #{studentCode}, primarySchool = #{primarySchool}, juniorHigh = #{juniorHigh}, seniorHigh = #{seniorHigh}, undergraduate = #{undergraduate}, graduate = #{graduate}, doctorate = #{doctorate} WHERE id = #{id}
